summary: Users were recommended to "get some rest" while Stepn worked to secure its servers and recover from the various attacks.
title: 'Move-to-Earn' Application Stepn Suffers Cyber Attack After Upgrade
content: Stepn, a "move-to-earn" application on the Solana blockchain that gives users cryptocurrency rewards from walking or jogging, suffered multiple distributed denial of service (DDOS) attacks following a recent upgrade.
